author: Jordan Davies
title: Chelsea confident Virgil van Dijk will choose Antonio Conte’s Blues over Manchester City
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments CHELSEA are confident they will prevail over Manchester City for the signing of Southampton star Virgil van Dijk this summer. 
Although heavily linked with Pep Guardiola’s City , Antonio Conte is confident that they will win the race for the £50 million rated Dutch defender. Reuters 3 The Saints signed the Dutch centre back from Celtic for £13 million in 2015 
Despite only conceding 21 goals in the Premier League this season Conte has made Van Dijk his No 1 priority as he looks to improve his team in all areas. 
Keep up to date with all the latest news, gossip, rumours and done deals in SunSport’s live transfer blog 
Although John Terry, 36, has been offered a one year contract extension, Chelsea are willing to blow away any rival for the 25 year old former Celtic star, one of the hottest properties in Europe. 
Chelsea know that will have to pay big money to fend off City but Conte has been assured of major funds this summer as he looks to make his mark in the Champions League next season. Reuters Southampton will demand at least £50 million for van Dijk, recognised as one of the best defenders in Europe Craig David salutes ex Celtic star Virgil van Dijk’s beat boxing skills 
While Southampton publicly insists that Van Dijk will stay this summer , they are resigned to the the fact that he may have played his last game for the club. 
The centre back is expected to be out for the rest of the season with a damaged ligament in his foot, picked up against Leicester City in January. 
This summer could be a familiar story for Saints' fans, who have lost the likes of Adam Lallana, Sadio Mane, Luke Shaw, Morgan Schneiderlin, Dejam Lovren, Nathanial Clyne, Jose Fonte and Victor Wanyama in recent seasons.
